sentences.en: a book depicting life in pre-revolutionary Russia
sentences.cn: 描写革命前俄国人生活的一本书

sentences.en: Although we still depict nostalgic snow scenes on Christmas cards, winters are now very much warmer.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们仍在圣诞卡上描绘着具有怀旧气氛的雪景，但现在的冬天比过去暖和多了。

sentences.en: Analyze the methods of depict and distill the shape and figure.
sentences.cn: 深入探讨了图像的形状和轮廓的描述与提取方法.

sentences.en: Children's books often depict farmyard animals as gentle, lovable creatures.
sentences.cn: 儿童图书常常把农场的动物描写得温和而可爱。

sentences.en: Egyptian hieroglyphs depict the same images carved in stone.
sentences.cn: 埃及人在雕刻的石头上用象形文字描绘同样的肖像.

sentences.en: Epitomize the general idea , the depict way of the text.
sentences.cn: 概括本文的大意和描写方法.

sentences.en: GARCH model is more suitable to depict stock market volatility formula . 2.
sentences.cn: GARCH模型更适合于股票市场波动的刻画.

sentences.en: I don't care to see plays or films that depict murders or violence.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢看描写谋杀或暴力的戏剧或电影.

sentences.en: Next year, we shall depict a riot of flowers on our calendar.
sentences.cn: 明年, 我们的日历将会有五彩缤纷的花朵.

sentences.en: No cigarette should be used as a prop to depict an undesirable character.
sentences.cn: 香烟不能用作刻划不良分子的手段.

sentences.en: Some use it as a means to depict their disorientation and melancholy.
sentences.cn: 有些人把沉默作为不辨方位和忧郁意思的描述.

sentences.en: The artist tried to depict realistically the Battle of Waterloo.
sentences.cn: 这位画家试图逼真地刻画滑铁卢战役.

sentences.en: The author tried to depict the splendor of the sunset.
sentences.cn: 作家试图摹写落日的光彩.

sentences.en: The painter tried to depict the splendour of the sunset.
sentences.cn: 画家试图描绘日落时的壮观景象.

sentences.en: Through brush strokes I depict the changes in his psychology and pulse.
sentences.cn: 我通过笔触描述他心理和脉搏的变化.

sentences.en: YT : We wanted to depict the darker side of children.
sentences.cn: 我们想描绘出小孩的阴暗面.

trans.tran_en: to describe something or someone in writing or speech, or to show them in a painting, picture etc
